definition: policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.english: He's very artful but sometimes miscarries.
sentences.chinese: 他很狡诈，但有时也会失策。

sentences.english: International evidence also undermines the case for Keynesianism.
sentences.chinese: 国际上的证据也表明了凯恩斯主义思想的失策。

sentences.english: That can lead to major missteps.
The  blunder made the underground  instrument  undergo an undermining of the thunderbolt.
sentences.chinese: 这个失策让地下仪器经受了一次雷电的破坏。

sentences.english: The flubs signal a deeper problem.
sentences.chinese: 失策暗示了一个更深层次的问题。

sentences.english: It is impolitic to offend people who can help you.
sentences.chinese: 触怒能帮助你的人是很失策的。

sentences.english: The blunder made the underground instrument undergo an undermining of the thunderbolt.
sentences.chinese: 这个失策让地下仪器禁受了一次雷电的破坏。

sentences.english: It is impolitic to offend people who can help you.
sentences.chinese: 触怒能帮助你的人是失策的。

sentences.english: It was a very unwise move.

definition: to show the wolf into the house (idiom)/to introduce a potential source of trouble
lit. to try to steal a chicken only to end up losing the rice used to lure it (idiom)/fig. to try to gain an advantage only to end up worse off/to go for wool and come back shorn
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: God's plans supersede our own/Man proposes but God disposes
pinyin: ren2 suan4 bu4 ru2 tian1 suan4

definition: to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
to learn a lesson from the mistakes of one's predecessor (idiom)
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
a faulty stroke in calligraphy or painting/a faulty expression in writing
lit. to nurture a tiger invites calamity/fig. to indulge one's enemy is asking for trouble (idiom)
to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom)/hoisted by one's own petard
pinyin: ban1 qi3 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3
